titleStmt.title: A Full and true relation as well of the blovving up of the Ann frigat as also of the examination, tryal, and condemnation of John Adams, the gunner thereunto belonging as the occasion of that accident by his default. For which he was on the 24th. of this instant December, sentenced by a councel of war to be hang'd.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication supplied by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
